ej,heatm001,P,barnl901,Fighting ej,martb105,M,barnl901,Call at HP (collision) $Carney Lansford suffered a jammed thumb on the play when he collided with catcher Mike Heath; Heath, having been run into on consecutive plays, came up swinging at Lansford; both benches cleared; Heath and Yankees manager Billy Martin ejected by HP umpire Larry Barnett
ej,fairr101,P,coont901,Call at 1B (Threw dirt on umpire) Ron Fairly ejected by 1B umpire Terry Cooney

ej,campb101,P,coont901,Fighting $Bert Campaneris tried to score on an errant pitch; Ken Brett covered HP and fell on Campaneris during the plate at HP; Brett headed for the bench but Campaneris picked up the ball and threw it at Brett; they exchanged words and punches; both benches cleared; Campaneris ejected by HP umpire Terry Cooney
